resources.string: HeyNotes is your minimal, distraction-free space for thoughts, ideas, and plans. It is designed to be fast, local and private when needed. All notes you create can be located under Internal Storage > Documents > HeyNotes. This allows you to bring in your previous .md files from any other app you currently use, and export them from this app when you need it.

Secure Folders are hidden from your phone\'s File Manager and exist in a protected storage area accessible only by this app. Be careful: If you delete a Secure Folder, all notes inside it are permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. Also keep in mind that each secure folder is separately protected by a unique PIN.
1. Tap the + button and select New Folder.\n2. Select the Black Color dot (it has a lock icon).\n3. Set your 4-digit PIN.
